hero.title: Explore Without Limits
hero.subtitle: Embrace the Journey
hero.description: Join a community fueled by a passion for discovery and adventure. Find and forge your path in the vast expanse of the outdoors. Each journey is a tale waiting to be told. Together, let's unlock the endless possibilities that await.

stravaSegmentTimingDescription: Soon you'll be able to estimate the best times on Strava segments directly within our app.
stravaIntegrationDescription: Login with Strava and import your activities to keep all your adventures in one place.
moreActivitiesDescription: We're expanding our horizons! Stay tuned for more activity types to track and share.
bmiCalculatorDescription: Track your progress with our built-in BMI calculator, designed for athletes.
calorieCounterDescription: Keep track of the energy you burn with our precise calorie calculator, tailored for outdoor sports.
trainingPlansDescription: Elevate your performance with cycling and running training plans, crafted for all levels.
multiLanguageSupportDescription: We're going global! Future support for multiple languages to make our app accessible to users worldwide.

activities-page-sidebar-cta.text: Is there an activity you'd like to see here?

comment.comment-placeholder: What do you think of this activity?

login-page.supplementary-text: EcoStride brings you closer to nature. Start your journey and embrace the adventure that lies in every turn.

login-page-cta.sub-text: Ready to explore the great outdoors?
login-page-cta.title: Discover new adventures with EcoStride

not-found.title: Not Found
not-found.title-one: Oops! You've strayed off the path...
not-found.description-one: Unexpected turns open the door to new adventures. Though this digital trail ends here, countless others await your discovery.
not-found.description-two: The path you seek may be closer than you think.
